Name: Large Freighter Room
Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.
Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

Name: Freighter Corridor
Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.
Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

Name: Freighter Junction
Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.
Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.
Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

Name: Freighter Cross Junction
Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.
Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

Name: Fleet Command Room
Description:
Core Fleet Management Station. This advanced holographic communications station is vital for managing fleet expeditions from the comfort of your capital ship.
User is advised that multiple stations are required to manage more than one expedition at a time.

Name: Cylindrical Room
Description: The core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

Name: Straight Corridor
Description: A standard straight corridor module for connecting rooms.

Name: L-Shaped Corridor
Description: A sturdy, corridor module for connecting rooms, with an L-shaped bend.

Name: T-Shaped Corridor
Description: A corridor module with a branching, t-shaped form, for joining multiple rooms.

Name: X-Shaped Corridor
Description: An x-shaped corridor unit for connecting four rooms in a cruciform arrangement.

Name: Glass Roofed Corridor
Description: Corridor with reinforced glass roofing.

Name: Viewing Sphere
Description: A self-contained spherical viewing platform which affords the user stunning views of the surrounding environment.

Name: Bio-Dome
Description: An attractive domed room which is perfect for cultivating a wide range of botanical matter.

Name: Cuboid Room
Description: A small, cuboid construction module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

Name: Solid Cube
Description: A large solid cube.

Name: Glass Cuboid Room
Description: A cuboid room module which is created almost entirely out of glass. Excellent for observing areas of natural beauty.

Name: Curved Cuboid Wall
Description: A curved, cuboid wall module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

Name: Curved Cuboid Roof
Description: A curved, glass-fronted roof module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

Name: Interior Stairs
Description: A set of stairs to improve access inside cuboid structures.

Name: Cuboid Inner Door
Description: An inner door module used to divide cuboid rooms.

Name: Cuboid Inner Wall
Description: An inner wall module used to divide cuboid rooms.

Name: Cuboid Room Flooring
Description: Hard-wearing composite floor panels cut for cuboid rooms.

Name: Door
Description: A compression-sealed, standard door suitable for all rooms and corridors.

Name: Access Ramp
Description: A reinforced, non-ferrous ramp to provide access to buildings.

Name: Climb Ladder
Description: A strong, lightweight ladder with reinforced anchor points for attaching to walls.

Name: Infrastructure Ladder
Description: A ladder used in conjunction with Structural Platforms to allow the user to reach great heights with ease.

Name: Cuboid Room Frame
Description: Lightweight cuboid support structures which can be stacked or linked to form large industrial structures.

Name: Paving
Description: Hard-wearing composite paving for the construction of walkways and paved areas.

Name: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut Quad
Description: A prefabricated set of four legs for supporting cuboid rooms.

Name: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut
Description: A sturdy leg for supporting cuboid rooms.

Name: Window
Description: A window made from self-cleaning, UV-treated, hermetically sealed glass.

Name: Large Glass Panel
Description: A window made from self-cleaning, UV-treated, hermetically sealed glass.

Name: Window (small)
Description: A window made from self-cleaning, UV-treated, hermetically sealed glass.

Name: Window (oval)
Description: A window made from self-cleaning, UV-treated, hermetically sealed glass.

Name: Window (oval)
Description: A window made from self-cleaning, UV-treated, hermetically sealed glass.

Name: Construction Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Construction Overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

Name: Exocraft Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Mechanics, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.

Name: Weapons Terminal
Description: Weapons terminalA research station tailored to the needs of Armourers, and equipped for the development of munitions and explosives as well as selected civilian tech.

Name: Science Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

Name: Agricultural Terminal
Description: Agricultural terminalA research station tailored to the needs of Farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

Name: Landing Pad
Description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

Name: Base Teleport Module
Description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.
User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

Name: Base Salvage Capsule
Description:
A construction recovery device.
This optional piece of base technology stores and preserves matter left over after the destruction of a previous base.

Name: Galactic Trade Terminal
Description: A trading terminal that provides instant local access to the market for resources and products.

Name: Health Station
Description: A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge health.

Name: Hazard Protection Unit
Description:
A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge the user's Hazard Protection systems.
The Hazard Protection Unit must be kept charged with a source of fuel.

Name: Medium Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Medium Refiner allows two different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 
The Medium Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

Name: Large Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Large Refiner allows three different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 
The Large Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

Name: Appearance Modifier
Description:
A buildable module that allows the users to adjust their personal appearance settings.
The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formated before use.

Name: Message Module
Description: A small and accessible information container for leaving messages or viewing left messages and short strings of information.

Name: Signal Booster
Description:
A versatile scanner that detects nearby buildings. Can decrypt Navigation Data to pinpoint specific locations.
The Signal Booster can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation.

Name: Save Beacon
Description: Once activated, beacons provide a permanent navigational waypoint, facilitating repeat visits to specific locations.

Name: Save Point
Description: A buildable save point for managing your progress.

Name: Communications Station
Description: A terminal for the composition and transmission of messages to other travellers.

Name: Atmosphere Harvester
Description: An automated siphon unit for the collection of valuable gases. Once activated, the harvester condenses and compresses substances from the air over time. Compressed gas is then stored safely until collected.

Name: Autonomous Mining Unit
Description: Empty and Full AMUAn automated harvester for the mining of resources. Once activated, the AMU extracts minerals without the need for supervision, providing a regular yield until the site is exhausted.

Name: Portable Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Portable Refiner can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation. Note: the Portable Refiner requires fuel to operate.

Name: Base Computer
Description:
A base computer prior to base constructionPortable land registration service.
When placed, contacts Universal Cartographic Archive to establish ownership of land. Successful registration allows the construction of base modules across any site of the user's choosing.

Name: Oxygen Harvester
Description:
An autonomous atmosphere extractor, this device can be left to collect and purify oxygen from the air. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.
The resulting gas is compressed and processed, ready for use in all standard life support systems.
 Oxygen Harvester in a base

Name: Blueprint Analyser
Description:
Portable blueprint decryption device.
This field-deployable memory salvage module allows the user to recover valuable data from old or damage technology modules.

Name: Marine Shelter
Description:
An emergency survival module.
Can be rapidly deployed on the seabed in the event of an oxygen or other Exosuit life support emergency. Provides temporary shelter from environmental hazards, predators and other hostiles forces found in the deep ocean.

Name: Exocraft Summoning Station
Description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft from anywhere else on that planet.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu to ease of use.

Name: Geobay
Description:
Nomad
An underground secure parking facility for the Nomad light Exocraft.Pilgrim
An underground secure parking facility for the Pilgrim light Exocraft.Roamer
An underground secure parking facility for the Roamer medium Exocraft.Colossus
An underground secure parking facility for the Colossus large Exocraft.

Name: Race Initiator
Description: This platform acts as the start and finish line for Exocraft field tests, allowing Travellers to practice manoeuvring and speed.

Name: Nautilon Chamber
Description: An advanced, fully-airlocked docking station for the Nautilon submarine.

Name: Hierba gamma
Description:
Planta luminosa y frondosa en floración que prospera en biomas radiactivos y produce una cosecha abundante si se cultiva.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Necesita un clima radiactivo antes de cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento:  4 horas

Name: Grupo fúngico
Description:
Hongo esférico con laminillas internas que solo se halla en biomas tóxicos. Los grupos fúngicos se pueden trasplantar para su cultivo, lo que produce una cosecha abundante y de rápido crecimiento.
Apto para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Necesita un clima tóxico para poder cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 4 horas

Name: Heliantemo
Description:
Gran flor cristalina de flor azul radiante que solo se halla en biomas nevados. El heliantemo se puede cultivar y su gran adaptación a condiciones extremas tiene como resultado cosechas muy frecuentes.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Necesita un clima congelado para poder cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento:  1 hora

Name: Erizo de mar venenoso
Description:
Planta pequeña y de apariencia inofensiva cuyas hojas segregan periódicamente una pequeña cantidad de sacos de veneno potentes, un producto de alto valor comercial.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. No puede cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 3 horas y 20 min

Name: Vid solar
Description:
Esta 'roca viva' se adapta bien a la vida en el calor extremo de los biomas abrasados. Aun así, se puede cultivar en la mayoría de entornos y, una vez se asienta, produce una cosecha moderada pero poco frecuente.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Necesita un clima cálido para poder cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 16 horas

Name: Flor de pudretripas
Description:
Flor fétida cultivable que presenta la misma estructura química que la materia fecal. Al plantarla en el interior, produce una cosecha de hecesio.Una buena alternativa a recoger hecesio a mano, lo que requiere alimentar criaturas   y después recolectar sus deposiciones. 
Las flores de hecesio se deben cultivar en una  bandeja hidropónica  .
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 4 horas

Name: Huésped de gravitino
Description:
Planta extraña y potencialmente parásita que produce una cosecha ocasional de bolas de gravitino, un producto de alto valor comercial.
Apta para cultivos en exteriores. No puede cultivarse en interiores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento:  2 horas

Name: Raíz de mordita
Description:
Tubérculo no comestible que produce una cosecha pequeña de cristales de mordita.Una alternativa pacífica a la recogida de mordita de los cadáveres de criaturas. 
La raíz de mordita se debe cultivar en una bandeja hidropónica.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 8 horas

Name: Equinocactus
Description:
El equinocactus es una planta comestible y deliciosa que responde bien al cultivo y produce una cosecha ocasional pero abundante. Es autóctona de los biomas áridos y puede resistir largos períodos de sequía.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Necesita un clima árido para poder cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento:  16 horas

Name: Zarza estelar
Description:
Planta cultivable de tamaño mediano que produce una cosecha ocasional de bulbos estelares de gran valor.
Apta para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. Requiere climas benignos para su cultivo exterior.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento: 4 horas

Name: Orbe de perla albumen
Description:
Orbe de cristal de tamaño mediano y cultivable que produce una cosecha ocasional de perlas albuminosas.
Apto para cultivos hidropónicos en interiores. No puede cultivarse en exteriores.
Tiempo aproximado de crecimiento:  80 min

Name: NipNip
Description:
Esta hierba medicinal es conocida por sus ásperos brotes, que se recolectan para producir Gekitos. La NipNip crece en ambientes fríos y húmedos, y a menudo se transforma en mala hierba.
Es adecuada para plantaciones hidropónicas de interior. Necesita un clima tropical o húmedo para poder plantarse en exteriores.

Name: Flora Containment
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Potted Plant
Description: A decorative pot for indoor plants.

Name: Hydroponic Tray
Description: A self-contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops. Build requirement: must be placed indoors.

Name: Large Hydroponic Tray
Description: Large hydroponic trays in a freighterA self-contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops. Can support up to four plants. Build requirement: must be placed indoors.

Name: Standing Planter
Description: A standing planter system for indoor cultivation of agricultural crops.

Name: Barrel Fabricator
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Crate Fabricator
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Banks of storage containersSpacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Freighter Storage Unit
Description:
Hybrid high-capacity storage unit / shelving module for installation in interstellar freighters.
Compatible with all standard life-support fittings.

Name: Locked Crate
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Small Crate
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Weapon Rack
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Chair (Variant 1)
Description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

Name: Chair (variant 2)
Description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

Name: Chair (variant 3)
Description: A comfortable chair designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with only mild numbing of the posterior.

Name: Table
Description: An all-purpose work surface built from non-magnetic, corrosion resistant materials.

Name: Bed
Description: A generously proportioned single bed, designed to accommodate most bipedal races, with minimum overhang of extremities.

Name: Light Table
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Shelf Panel
Description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Name: Paving (tall)
Description: Hard-wearing composite paving for the construction of walkways and paved areas.

Name: Terbium Growth
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Light Fissure
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Bubble Cluster
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Hexplate Bush
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Glitching Separator
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Ossified Star
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Rattle Spine
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Cable Pod
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Calcishroom
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Capilliary Shell
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Electric Cube
Description: A rare stabilised glitch, retrieved from a malfunctioning planet. Safe for rehousing in habitable bases.

Name: Deepwater Chamber
Description: The core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

Name: Square Deepwater Chamber
Description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

Name: Moon Pool Floor
Description:
A holographic moon pool hatch. Allows easy access into and out of aquatic environments.
Pressurisation systems are automatically and discreetly hidden around the room.

Name: Watertight Door
Description: A compression-sealed, standard door suitable for all rooms and corridors.

Name: Glass Tunnel
Description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.
Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

Name: L-Shaped Glass Tunnel
Description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.
Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

Name: T-Shaped Glass Tunnel
Description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.
Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

Name: X-Shaped Glass Tunnel
Description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.
Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

Name: Vertical Glass Tunnel
Description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.
Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.
